abstract.p: Proximate contents of H. arborescens leaves were present in significant amounts and very rich in K, Ca, and Fe with considerable amounts of Mg, Mn, Na, P, Cu, and Zn .Vitamins A, C, and E were observed in high amounts. Phytate, oxalate, saponin, and alkaloids were below toxic levels except for saponin which was in moderately high level. The results indicate that H. arborescens leaves are nutrient‚Äêrich and can contribute effectively to the daily nutrient requirements alongside its therapeutic properties.
